title: if league client dont open do this
body: go to ur lol folder and delete LOCKFILE and try to open the client and it will work.

replies.body: I can't vouch for deleting or modifying files, you're more likely to cause further problems down the line.  The client not opening is usually caused by a setting or anti-virus blocking it from launching.  The steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide can usually help by restoring that access.
Or just run task manager and stop the league process thats idle at the bottom of your Processes tab.
